entry.content:
Strong scaling

Strong scaling plot for the average timing of an SCF iteration for LDA energy and gradient calculation. Time obtained with QETSc and ScaLAPACK are shown with filled blue circles and red squares, respectively. Error bars show the spread of SCF iterations with QETSc.

  • Polyethlyene with 64 unit cells, 384 atoms, 2944 orbitals.

  • Polyethlyene with 256 unit cells, 1536 atoms, 11776 orbitals.

  • 128 water clusters, 384 atoms, 2944 orbitals.

  • 512 water clusters, 1536 atoms, 11776 orbitals.

Eigenvalues and slices

Eigenvalues and slices are shown for the molecular dynamics simulation of Boron nitride monolayer with 512 atoms. Only 3 MD steps are shown.
